name: QA - Brickwork
Mortar mixed correctly and colour consistent
Premium white mortar is used as per specification plan
Mortar joints are in alignment
Cavity width correct
Cavity insulation installed as per plan
Standard Brick ties used are as per the specifications, correct length and installed correctly – 5 degree
Fero brick ties installed as per the specifications
Cavity and brick ties free of mortar and debris
Weep-holes checked and accurate (required every 3 bricks at base and sills)
Brick sill installed and checked – 15 degree consistent fall
Façade bricks are installed as per plan
Double layers of bricks are installed as per plan
QA - Blocklaying
Prestart
Approval from Summerset foreman to begin blocklaying
Set up accurate stringline for entire face
Blocking Installation
Check blocks and any broken ones discarded
Temporary bracing has been installed as required
Walls have been properly grouted
Any openings are temporarily braced / Supported
Space is warm, with proper air flow to promote drying of mortar
Temporary lighting has been installed on both sides of wall(to avoid dark spaces)
Any reinforcement including lintels, rebar etc have been installed as per engineering design
Wash holes in tidy conditions
Wall is installed true / plumb and in line with layout
Handover
Block installation completed to specified satandard & finish
